title: Time to update Zwift: the neon lights of Neokyo are now on with Makuri Islands expansion
content:
It’s been teased for almost a month, but Zwift’s latest map expansion is finally open for business riding. Modeled after the big cities of Japan, Neokyo offers a fun, vibrant feel plus eight new routes. Hidden within the world of the Makuri Islands and doubling it in size, Neokyo offers a completely different experience with

The post Time to update Zwift: the neon lights of Neokyo are now on with Makuri Islands expansion appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
